page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS STORY
page.content: It was some time last year that there was a fire down Lansbury Avenue. It was all over the news and in the local papers.It started in the early morning because as I live in the road opposite i heard all of the fire engines comming. It was supposed to have started in the frontroom by an electric fire.The children must have seen the fire first because they started screaming.Their father heard them and he ran upstairs to get his wife out of the bath. When he had safely got his wife out of the house he ran back inside to try and get to the children but he was too late for they were already dead. The fire engines and ambulances were only a few minutes away.It was very upsetting and tradgic.
